backend/main.mo: Defines song types, storage maps, and access-controlled APIs for uploading, streaming, and managing public and personal songs. Integrates authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing frontend changes needed for updated public upload permissions, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering styling, routing, hooks, components, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, applying them globally.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root mount node, and script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global theme provider, and toast system for the application.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by requiring authentication and admin role, showing login or access request UI when needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/GrantAdmin: Admin tool for granting admin access by validating a Principal ID and submitting it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/RequestAdm: Displays access-denied messaging with the caller's Principal ID and copy-to-clipboard support for requesting admin access.
frontend/src/components/admin/SongEditor: Dialog for creating or editing songs, handling metadata, file uploads, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth and updates query cache.
frontend/src/components/branding/Fourlea: Renders the Fourleaf brand logo in full, compact, or icon-only variants.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogS: Row-style card showing song info, cover, duration, play controls, and download option.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Download: Download button that checks auth and subscription status, fetches song audio, and triggers file download.
frontend/src/components/catalog/PublicSo: Dialog for uploading public songs with form validation, file handling, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/home/HorizontalS: Horizontally scrollable snap row container for displaying items.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingCa: Clickable streaming card displaying song cover and play button with transition context.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingSe: Section wrapper with title, optional icon, show-all button, and content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with sidebar, header, content outlet, audio player bar, and profile setup dialog logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderSea: Provides a search bar with home navigation, browse menu, and query handling with UI sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/HomeTabBa: Renders tab buttons for switching between All, Music, and Podcast views on the home page.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Implements the left navigation sidebar with links, admin access, branding, and UI sound controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/RightDeta: Shows a now-playing panel with song details or a placeholder when nothing is playing.
frontend/src/components/personal/Persona: Dialog for uploading personal songs with form fields, file inputs, authentication checks, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/player/AudioPlay: Audio playback bar managing play controls, queue, streaming blobs, and timing updates using an HTML audio element.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a required profile setup dialog for new authenticated users to enter name and subscription status.
frontend/src/components/settings/UISound: UI component providing toggle and volume slider for UI sound effects using stored settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioQueue.ts: Zustand store managing audio playback queue, state, navigation, volume, and now-playing UI context.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeaderSearch.ts: Zustand store for tracking and updating the header search query.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBrowsing.ts: Zustand store for tracking active home browsing tab and scroll reset requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, storage, and status handling through a React context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating songs, profiles, and other backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISounds.ts: Hook providing UI click sound playback respecting stored sound settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISoundSettings.ts: Persistent Zustand store storing UI sound toggle and volume settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom themes, utilities, and animations for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, providers, and global QueryClient.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard listing songs with create, edit, and delete controls using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Public library page showing all songs with search, browsing sections, recommendations, and playback integration.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: User’s personal library with login gating, personal song management, filtering, playback, and upload dialog.
frontend/src/pages/NowPlayingPage.tsx: Fullscreen now‑playing view with artwork, playback controls, progress slider, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerLayoutPage.tsx: Layout with sidebar, hero section, basic playback controls, and sample track list using current audio queue state.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders a pricing page with three subscription plans and feature lists using UI components.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Provides a function that normalizes raw backend error messages into clear, user-friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current issues, and feature requests related to public catalog upload permissions and backend behavior.
